name: Baron Magic
description:
Baron Mágic is a 3D action game made for PC where the main character is a wizard who has to save his wife who has been kidnapped by monsters.
The game is a 3D make-up game with 5 levels and each one has 3 acts , the character can create his spells and have elemental powers, Buff speed and defense and can conjure weapons and monsters to help in his adventure.
There is a wide variety of items such as staffs, magic rings, necklaces and arcane costumes. All items add powers to the character and are found throughout the journey in lost chests, in the depths of dark caves or in the power of dangerous monsters.
